Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: The food and service was amazing. For drinks we had the banana and mango beer which was so good and for food we asked the server what he would recommend and it definitely didn't disappoint. We got to taste a little bit of everything and the vibe of the restaurant was also really nice. Definitely recommend!

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: This is a very good Abyssinian restaurant at the Ceintuurbaan. You can have here a lot of traditional Abyssinian food. I had some very delcious vegeterian food and it was tasting wonderful.  the service is very kind and helpful. So it was a great joy for me. At all i will come again.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: This is so far my favorite of the Ethiopian restaurants in the area (I have tried all but 1 in the vicinity). The portions are generous and the flavors and spice level are on point. The ambiance is comfortable and homey. I like that they ‚Ä¶

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: I have come here several times over the years. Warm and friendly owners and tasty food. Highly recommend!

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: The food was so delicious and better quality than most things you can find in Amsterdam! If you‚Äôre looking for a unique taste and surroundings near Centraal, this is the place to go! It was pretty quiet when we went on New Years Day, so I‚Äôm ‚Ä¶

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: One of my favourites restaurants in Amsterdam. A different food experience (I am Spanish). Great food (consider that could be a bit spicy). Wonderful service. Amazing decoration. Nice prices. Truly recommend!!!

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text:
First time we tried this restaurant.
First of all, we ordered our food, and my friend, who cannot eat spicy food at ALL, ordered a dish asking specifically NOT to have it spicy. ‚Ä¶

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Amazing food, atmosphere and service- very kind and welcoming, highly recommended!

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Incredible food, relaxed atmosphere, great music and exceptional service. A well deserved 5 stars.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text:
If you want some hearty Ethiopian dish, friendly Service come here. We arrived here with the four of us and asked the chef to prepare a combination of his liking. He made us an amazing platter.
Highly recommended!

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Excellent atmosphere here and the staff is very nice. The food was tasty as well. We got lamb, chicken and beef. All cooked well and had a bit of spice to them, just the way we like it. Definitely an experience as well, highly recommend coming here.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: The place was perfect. Really good african taste! The staff was so friendly and happy that it made the experience even better. We had the shared vegetarian plate and the one with meat. Its a really good varity of flavors. Also the banana bear from a coconut is nice to try

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Well not my typical type of food sour pancake which i hope there is riceüòÑ but then the ambience and beer are really unique to experience plus not to forget youll eat here with your hand, no utensils allowedüòä so looks and feels like youre out of holland for adventure a bit for the night

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Awesome place to go to if you're looking to try some different food. What made it even more worthwhile for us were the multiple vegan options on the menu. Very friendly people who work there as well. Would definitely recommend!

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Delicious and authentic Ethiopian food for a reasonable price. A lot of varied choices on the menu. The decoration and ambience is very authentic and the waiters are extremely friendly and welcoming!

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text:
Delicious dishes that are served beautifully. Especially loved the coconut and mango beer in coconut shell bowl.
Loved the decor. Will definitely visit again!

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: I liked their design very much, the food was tasty and interesting at the same time in the good price range

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Taste is more accomodating of European guests than real Ethiopian tastes. Service is friendly and the decor is nice.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Really enjoyed the place. Took a lamb dish and a vegetarian dish with pumpkin. It was amazing.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Delicious Food and Amazing service ,Fair price

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text:
Never again.
The food is NOT nice. Maybe for someone who is nostalgic can have a value.
We were 7 people and we ordered 4 meals because we were 3 couples that wanted to ‚Ä¶

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Had a nice dinner with friendly waiter.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text:
Tasty food - I had the national dish. Unlike a few comments here, I did not find that the portions were especially big: 2 meals are good for 2 people.
Positively surprised by the fruity beer served in a wood bowl.
Friendly staff, we had to wait quite a bit to get served though.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Delicious food. Have been going there with my partner for the past two years! The staff knows how to prepare the best dish for you. Just ask them for help üí™üèº

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Really cool place, and concept! Go there with a couple of friends, order a couple of different dishes, and you'll get your order on a big plate, placed in the middle so you and your friends can share :) Dig in with your hands and enjoy! I'd ‚Ä¶

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: They have craft beer based on native Tigray recipe, and great interior but food is better around the corner in another Abyssinian restaurant.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Best Ethiopian in Amsterdam, always service with a smile and plenty vegetarian and vegan options

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Loved the food, but be aware, no cutlery here :)

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Very original concept. Lets you meet a little bit more of the culture with the deliscious food they have. Staff is very friendly and service is fast. You should try the mango beer.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Great atmosphere, staff is nice!  I especially loved enjerra zigni, my friend loved the banana beer. One of the best Ethiopian restaurants in The Netherlands.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Fantastic food and a completely different culinary experience. Staff were friendly and made good recommendations on the food to try because our group had not been before. It was delicious.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: horrible service, meat gryssly and little flavor. No napkins. Nothing original about the flavour. When we said the meat was chewy, first we got ignored for 15 minutes and than when we left and suggested to take the meat of the bill the ‚Ä¶

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Every time I visit, we try to eat here. I do not understand the bad ratings, probably they do not understand how true ethiopian foon is served and eaten? We always are 4 or more people. Excellent taste, excellent experience, sharing is the ‚Ä¶

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Nice Ethiopian food but staff was not very interested, mainly on their phones and the music was loud. Food was tasty, but you have to eat Ethiopian food with your hands, mine smelled like the enjeera the rest of the day no matter how much I washed them.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Quite pleased with this restaurant. The flavours are amazing and the staff is very friendly. Certainly one of the better Ethiopian spots in Amsterdam at a good price.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Not a child friendly place. We had to leave, as the waiter ignored us pointedly and complained that our 1.5 year old did not stay in her seat. Better Ethiopian restaurants with real ethiopian hospitality are not far from Abyssinia.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Friendly staff, delicious food and nice atmosphere, all at an affordable price and in a rather central location. I highly recommend this place !!

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Good African food. Service is friendly and fast, prices are honest. Would recommend.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Food is decent, portions are big - knowing this we want to share 3 meals between 4 people but they do not allow this.

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Cozy place with amazing food. The staff is super friendly and fun! Definitely coming back here

Name: Abyssinia
Review Text: Super nice ambience and delicious food! Good music and friendly staff. Cool vibe
